name: Clin T Melanoma Floor of Mouth
title: Clinical T
notes:
**Note 1:**  Assign 88 for in situ cases (behavior code /2). TNM does not include an in situ category for mucosal melanoma tumors.

**Note 2:**  Mucosal melanomas are aggressive tumors, therefore, T1 and T2 are omitted, as are Stages I and II. 

**Note 3:**  Assign T3 for localized tumor when no other information is available or for extension involving the mucosa only of adjacent sites.

**Note 4:**  Assign T4a or T4b for extension involving the deeper tissues of the primary or adjacent sites.
footnotes: \* T4 is not defined by UICC in the 7th edition. Approval has been provided by UICC to use "Tumor invades bone, nerve or extrinsic deep muscles" as T4.
rows:
Clinical evaluation performed but unknown results or extension not stated
Clinical evaluation performed but results not documented in patient record
Tumor limited to the epithelium and/or submucosa (mucosal disease)

Tumor extension confined to mucosa of:  
    Anterior two-thirds of tongue
    Base of tongue
    Epiglottis
    Floor of mouth WITH or WITHOUT crossing midline
    GIngiva (alveolar ridge), lower
    Glossoepiglottic fold
    Glossopharyngeal sulcus
    Lateral pharyngeal wall
    Pharyngeal (lingual) surface
    Pharyngoepiglottic fold
    Tonsillar pillars and fossae
    Tonsils
    Vallecula

Localized, NOS

Stated as T3

Note: T4 has subcategories of T4a and T4b. Assign T4 only when there is no information available to assign one of the subcategories

Tumor invades bone, nerve or extrinsic deep muscles

Stated as T4[NOS]

Tumor invades: 
     Deep soft tissue
     Cartilage
     Bone
     Overlying skin

Deep (extrinsic) muscle of tongue:
    Genioglossus
    Geniohyoid
    Hyoglossus
    Mylohyoid
    Palatoglossus
    Styloglossus

Maxillary sinus (antrum)
Skin of undersurface of chin/neck
Trabecular bone of mandible
Trabecular bone of maxilla

Stated as T4a

Tumor invades any of the following:
    Brain
    Dura
    Skull base
    Lower cranial nerves (IX, X, XI, XII)
    Masticator space
    Carotid artery
    Prevertebral space
    Mediastinal structures
In situ case but no pTis is defined by TNM

No clinical evaluation of primary tumor
Cancer first detected on surgical resection
Unknown if any clinical assessment performed
